#summary PlayPcmWin -- WASAPI player for audiophiles
#labels Featured

= PlayPcmWin =

PlayPcmWin is another opensource audio player for windows.

= Features =

  * Supports WASAPI exclusive mode playback. Bit-perfect capable.
  * Memory play. Load all PCM data onto the main memory before playback starts.
  * Native 64-bit C++ code for the playback thread. C# WPF GUI for easy use.
  * Supports WAV(16, 24, 32bit), FLAC(16, 24bit), AIFF(16, 24bit) format.
  * Supports CUE sheets.
  * Gapless playback.
